songs.title: Sex Yeah (Second Demo)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Sex, sex, sex, sex (Yeah)
Sex, sex, sex (La, da-da-da)
Sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex (La, da-da-da-da-da-da)
Sex, sex, sex, sex (Mmm)
Sex, sex, sex (La, da-da-da)
Sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex (La, da-da-da-da-da-da-da)

[Verse 1]
Nothing is provocative (Aah-aah, aah-aah)
Anymore, even for kids
No room for imagining
'Cause everyone's seen everything (Aah-aah-aah, aah-aah-aah, aah)

[Pre-Chorus 1]
Question what the TV tells you (Yeah, yeah) (La, da-da-da)
Question what a pop star sells you (La, da-da-da-da-da-da-da, yeah)
Question mom and question dad (La, da-da-da)
Question good and question bad (La, da-da-da-da-da-da-da)

[Chorus 1]
If history could set you free (from who you were supposed to be)
If sex in our society (didn't tell a girl who she would be)
'Cause all my life I've tried to fight what history has given me

[Post-Chorus]
Sex, sex, sex, sex (Yeah)
Sex, sex, sex (La, da-da)
Sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex (La, da-da-da-da-da-da)

[Verse 2]
If women were religiously
Recognized sexually
We wouldn't have to feel the need
To show our ass it's to feel free (Aah-aah-aah, aah-aah-aah, aah)

[Pre-Chorus 2]
Been there, done that, got the t-shirt (La, da-da-da)
Sold my soul, and yeah, the truth hurt (La, da-da-da-da-da-da)
Tired image of a star
Acting naughtier than we really are (La, da-da-da-da-da)

[Chorus 2]
If history could set you free (from who you were supposed to be)
If sex in our society (didn't tell a guy who he should be)
'Cause all my life I've tried to fight what history has given me, me

[Post-Coro]
Sex, sex, sex, sex (Yeah)
Sex, sex, sex (La, da-da-da)
Sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex (La, da-da-da-da-da-da)
Sex, sex, sex, sex (Yeah)
Sex, sex, sex (La, da-da-da)
Sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex (La, da-da-da-da-da-da-da)

[Bridge]
All my life I've felt it deep inside of me
All this time was fighting for what I believe
All my life I've tried to hide what history has given me... me

[Chorus 2]
If history could set you free, free (Yeah) (La, da-da-da)
(La, da-da-da-da-da-da)
From who you were supposed to be, be, be (Yeah) (La, da-da-da)
(La, da-da-da-da-da-da)
'Cause all my life I've tried to fight what history has given me

[Outro]
Sex, sex, sex, sex (Yeah)
Sex, sex, sex (La, da-da-da)
Sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex (La, da-da-da-da-da-da)
Sex, sex, sex, sex (Yeah)
Sex, sex, sex (La, da-da-da)
Sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex (La, da-da-da-da-da-da-da)
